website_summaries.verdict: A gorgeous marble rolling pin with wood handles and a solid wooden rest to keep it in place.
pros: The solid marble is very heavy, which makes rolling out pastry and dough much easier
Cradle conveniently prevents it from rolling away when not in use
cons: Some find it too heavy to use comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rolling pin
customer_reviews.text: I love this rolling pin. It makes rolling a crust so much easier, and since the marble stays cold, the dough doesn't tend to overheat from being worked. Also the weight of the pin means that i don't have to exert much force to use it.
customer_reviews.author: megomole

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It would have been five stars, but the center hole was drilled on an angle which makes the whole thing wobble when using it. Other than that, it serves it's purpose, just a little annoying though.
customer_reviews.author: Lembcrickas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a wedding present. It is so pretty and well made I might order another for myself. It is a really good weight and is attractive enough that it could be stored on the counter.

customer_reviews.title: Like Baking Must Have This.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, what a pleasure to be able to use something of such good quality which will last me for years. I have searched for one locally as my 30yr old one fell and broke, no baking for a while as what was in stores are not as good as the one I had. When told to check out Amazon, there it was on its own stand and it will more than likely get passed onto my daughter, as this product is smooth to use, always cool and easy to clean also not to heavy for me. An attractive design in the marble and looks good on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret winston

customer_reviews.title: Marbleous
customer_reviews.text: I got one of each of these for my 2 daughters. The eldest said it was too big for her San Diego sized apartment. My other daughter said it was too big for her Oman sized house and wouldn't make the Delta wt limit for her suitcase. I did check out these rolling pins. They appear to be very high quality, without blemish. Guess I'll have to order a third for myself, get on a roll, and eschew my Mrs. Smith's pie crust habit (hey, I'm a guy, give me a break).

customer_reviews.title: I love my rolling pin!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. If you have arthritis in your hands its amazing the weight of the pin does most of the work for you. I would buy this for friends and family and would even get another one. Its so durable you know you can pass it down and omg the base they send to set it on is awesome. You can display it and use it. Also nothing sticks to it. I used fondant and we all know how it sticks to wood..Nothing sticks...Trust me this is worth it and its CHEAP..you can't loose
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Green

customer_reviews.title: Okay but heavy and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to the non stick idea of a marble rolling pin. The ability to stick it in the fridge and have cold marble seemed like it would work really well, and it did to a point. My main problem was with the heaviness and bulky feeling of this rolling pin. Some would probably find the heaviness a plus, for me it just makes rolling a chore, especially when rolling out something like puff pastry that takes a lot of work. The rolling pin just seemed to get heavier and heavier and my wrists more and more sore. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Evco white marble rolling pin
customer_reviews.text: The Evco marble rolling pin is of fair quality in that the marble portion is not completely uniform.I would call it "out of round".The handles are not solid wood. But for the money it is a good deal.

customer_reviews.title: Marble

customer_reviews.author: Mary A

product_meta.title: Creative Home White Marble Rolling Pin with Wooden Cradle
product_meta.description: This 18" L marble rolling pin has a large comfort grip (4" L each side), Wooden handles and a wooden cradle to hold the rolling pin when not in use. Marble keeps moisture, grease and odors from penetrating. It's easy to clean and is non porous. Hand crafted and carved from whole piece genuine natural marble stone, any Color variation is its own uniqueness. Dimensions: Overall 2-1/4" Diam. x 18" L; marble: 10" L, handle: 4" L each side. The smoothness and heft of the marble make it ideal for a rolling pin. Comes with a wood cradle for your rolling pin when not in use. Easy to clean, hand washing recommend.
